nodes.text: Captured on Cloud City is a Star Wars young-readers title in the World of Reading Level 2 series. It was written by Nate Millici, illustrated by Pilot Studio, and published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on July 11, 2017. The story adapts Han Solo's carbon-freezing and Luke Skywalker's lightsaber duel with Darth Vader from the film Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back. Captured on Cloud City was released exclusively as part of World of Reading Star Wars Boxed Set: Level 2.
